rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 11 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 1:20 AM, 29 June 2025(Sunday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Metro Manila, Bulacan, Batangas, Laguna, Bataan, Zambales, Quezon and Pampanga within the next 3 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Cavite(Naic, Tanza, Maragondon) and Rizal(Tanay, Antipolo, Baras) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
